data.text: I love Mac, and it’s a shame what happened. But you can’t blame someone else for his overdose. #UnpopularOpinion
Is with another drug user. Maybe he became toxic, depressed, and angry while on drugs. She had every right to get away from that.

Lonely and sad he was because of the fame. Don’t be so ignorant and blind to what he was going through. Plus, I’m sure she feels guilt; that is just a human emotion that is bound to come from this. Also, stop worrying about how she didn’t like Macs drug problem but she
